title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 §§ 154-2.14 - Identification of permit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 §§ 154-2.14 - Identification of permit

State Regulations
(a) The
original permit must be carried in the vehicle to which it refers. Failure to
carry such permit shall result in the permit being null and void for that
particular operation or occurrence. (b) The permit must be immediately open to
the inspection of any peace officer, acting pursuant to his special duties, or
police officer, or any other officer or employee authorized to enforce this
section, upon request. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
§§
154-2.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
